attributes.action: Request that the European Union consider the lawfulness of UEFA rules in relation to Red Card Appeals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Darren Fletcher received a red card in the semi-final of the Champions League.  It was clearly not a foul, however the current UEFA rules do not allow an appeal, and we the undersigned believe that this is a breach of Darren's human rights.  We request that the PM refers this issue to the European Parliament for consideration as a breach of human rights.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
